name: Crazy-code-like-js-fiddle
tagline: You can add html,css and js code and get result in within micro second create file dymanically and get result.
body:
# html-css-js-code-like-jsfiddle
You can add html,css and js code and get result in within micro second create file dymanically and get result.
save your project in htdocs and save project name with crazy code
or if you want to choose your name change site url in index.php file
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
